segment.source: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: If you are a mobile user, you might want to fully load your applications in the cache to use them during disconnected operation or offline mode.
segment.target: If you are a mobile user, you might want to fully load your applications in the cache to use them during disconnected operation or offline mode.

segment.source: To stream applications from the Application Virtualization (App-V) Server or the Application Virtualization (App-V) Streaming Server, you must be connected to a server to load applications.
segment.target: To stream applications from the Application Virtualization (App-V) Server or the Application Virtualization (App-V) Streaming Server, you must be connected to a server to load applications.

segment.source: If you are not connected to the server when you attempt to load applications, your system will generate an appropriate error message.
segment.target: If you are not connected to the server when you attempt to load applications, your system will generate an appropriate error message.

segment.source: You can also stream applications to the client from a file or disk.
segment.target: You can also stream applications to the client from a file or disk.

segment.source: The applications are loaded one application at a time.
segment.target: The applications are loaded one application at a time.

segment.source: The progress bar shows you the application name, the percentage of application loaded, and the number of applications already processed compared to the total number of the applications queued.
segment.target: The progress bar shows you the application name, the percentage of application loaded, and the number of applications already processed compared to the total number of the applications queued.

segment.source: You can skip any application in progress before it is 100% loaded.
segment.target: You can skip any application in progress before it is 100% loaded.

segment.source: You can skip the loading of all remaining applications as well.
segment.target: You can skip the loading of all remaining applications as well.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If your system encounters an error while loading an application, it reports the error to you.
segment.target: If your system encounters an error while loading an application, it reports the error to you.

segment.source: You must dismiss the error dialog before it will load the next application.
segment.target: You must dismiss the error dialog before it will load the next application.

segment.source: To load all applications
segment.target: To load all applications

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization System icon in the notification area.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization System icon in the notification area.

segment.source: Select Load Applications from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Select Load Applications from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: To skip applications
segment.target: To skip applications

segment.source: Click the progress bar to display the dialog box.
segment.target: Click the progress bar to display the dialog box.

segment.source: Select one of the following buttons to achieve the desired results:
segment.target: Select one of the following buttons to achieve the desired results:

segment.source: Skip—To skip the currently loading application.
segment.target: Skip—To skip the currently loading application.

segment.source: Skip All—To skip all remaining applications.
segment.target: Skip All—To skip all remaining applications.

segment.source: Continue—To cancel the dialog box and continue loading applications.
segment.target: Continue—To cancel the dialog box and continue loading applications.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
segment.target: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
